frameDefinitions: This frame covers descriptions of an entire human body, viewed as a gestalt (as opposed to descriptions based on salient body parts).
The words in this frame have to do with people and the personal Relationships they are or can be a part of.
A Hunter tries to gain Food by way of outsmarting or tracking a living.
A Group is described as having members which are similar or dissimilar to each other.
An Entity has a Sharpness characterized by its capability to cut.
In this frame an Agriculturist cultivates Food.
frameExamples: And of course that drippy <t><fex name='Partner_1'>boyfriend</fex></t> of hers backed her up.
In the Congo, he hunted big game for the first time.
The <t>diversity</t> of students here is to be applauded . INI
Peasants were encouraged to <t>cultivate</t> basic food crops such as beans and corn
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the individual (or individuals) being described.
This role identifies the <fen>Figure</fen> or form being described by the target.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is realized as the subject of verbs in active form sentences, or of adjectives in predicative uses.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is not expressed as the external argument.
The joint construal of both <fen>Partners</fen> in the <fen>Relationship</fen>.
The <fen>Hunter</fen> is the agent hoping to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
<fen>Food</fen> is the sought-out item by the <fen>Hunter</fen>.
This is the entity to which the <fen>Hunter</fen> pays attention. It is referred to as <fen>Ground</fen> because it serves as the background or context for the <fen>Food</fen>.
When the <fen>Time</fen> seeking action occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Hunter</fen> attempts to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
This role marks constituents that express the set of objects or types whose diversity is at issue.
This role marks constituents which express a property in respect to which the similarity of the <fen>Group</fen> is assessed.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the Group is diverse or homogenous.
The <fen>Place</fen> is the general area in which diversity occurs or exists.
The <fen>Entity</fen> to which the <fen>Sharpness</fen> attribute is related.
The sharpness feature of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Sharpness</fen> from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Entity</fen>.
The <fen>Sharpness</fen> value of the <fen>Entity</fen>.  This role is denoted by the adjectives of the frame.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular value for <fen>Sharpness</fen>.
The <fen>Agriculturist</fen> is the agent cultivating <fen>Food</fen>.
<fex name='Food'>Food</fex> is the item cultivated by the <fen>Agriculturist</fen>.
This is the the background or context for the <fen>Food</fen> to which the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> pays attention in his agricultural efforts.
When the agricultural event occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> cultivates <fen>Food</fen>.
listRoleExamples: Romans were cultivating <fex>the land</fex> in Northern Gaul.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the second half of the decade
